Quick #rstats script to illustrate normality of data versus residuals:

n <- 1000
d <- data.frame(
  grp = rep(0:1, each = n),
  dv = c(rnorm(n), rnorm(n, 5))
)

# data are bimodal
hist(d$dv)

# model
m <- lm(dv ~ grp, d)
d$res <- residuals(m)

# residuals are normal
hist(d$res) https://t.co/PDUQYCt9hV

Some #rstats news:

It turns out that R is for skateboard use only, and is not designed for other activities.*
